trans-unit.source: Describes how to create popular application frameworks by using templates with Azure Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to create popular application frameworks by using templates with Azure Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: Examples include the LAMP stack, SharePoint, and SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Examples include the LAMP stack, SharePoint, and SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Create application frameworks by using templates
trans-unit.target: Create application frameworks by using templates

trans-unit.source: Use this stuff to create great things, quickly.
trans-unit.target: Use this stuff to create great things, quickly.

trans-unit.source: This is a Microsoft-created template that deploys up to *n* new VMs (along with a new virtual network and storage account).
trans-unit.target: This is a Microsoft-created template that deploys up to *n* new VMs (along with a new virtual network and storage account).

trans-unit.source: This template deploys two new VMs (along with a new virtual network, storage account, and load balancer) and creates a new Active Directory forest and domain.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys two new VMs (along with a new virtual network, storage account, and load balancer) and creates a new Active Directory forest and domain.

trans-unit.source: Each VM is created as a DC for the new domain and placed in an availability set.
trans-unit.target: Each VM is created as a DC for the new domain and placed in an availability set.

trans-unit.source: Each VM will also have an RDP endpoint added with a public load-balanced IP address.
trans-unit.target: Each VM will also have an RDP endpoint added with a public load-balanced IP address.

trans-unit.source: This template uses the Azure Linux CustomScript extension to deploy an Apache web server.
trans-unit.target: This template uses the Azure Linux CustomScript extension to deploy an Apache web server.

trans-unit.source: The template creates an Ubuntu VM, installs Apache2, and creates a simple HTML file.
trans-unit.target: The template creates an Ubuntu VM, installs Apache2, and creates a simple HTML file.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Couchbase cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Couchbase cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: This template installs a DataStax cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.
trans-unit.target: This template installs a DataStax cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.

trans-unit.source: This template installs a DataStax Enterprise cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.
trans-unit.target: This template installs a DataStax Enterprise cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Django application on an Ubuntu VM by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Django application on an Ubuntu VM by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.

trans-unit.source: It does a silent install of Python and Apache.
trans-unit.target: It does a silent install of Python and Apache.

trans-unit.source: This template allows you to deploy an Ubuntu VM with Docker (by using the Docker extension) and three Docker containers pulled directly from Docker Hub and deployed via Docker Compose.
trans-unit.target: This template allows you to deploy an Ubuntu VM with Docker (by using the Docker extension) and three Docker containers pulled directly from Docker Hub and deployed via Docker Compose.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys an Elasticsearch cluster on Ubuntu VMs and uses template linking to create data node scale units.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys an Elasticsearch cluster on Ubuntu VMs and uses template linking to create data node scale units.

trans-unit.source: This template creates a multiserver Hortonworks HDP 2.2 Apache Hadoop deployment on CentOS virtual machines, and it configures the HDP installation across a cluster.
trans-unit.target: This template creates a multiserver Hortonworks HDP 2.2 Apache Hadoop deployment on CentOS virtual machines, and it configures the HDP installation across a cluster.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Jenkins master node on an Ubuntu VM and multiple Jenkins slave nodes on two additional VMs.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Jenkins master node on an Ubuntu VM and multiple Jenkins slave nodes on two additional VMs.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Kafka cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Kafka cluster on Ubuntu VMs by using the Azure Linux CustomScript extension.

trans-unit.source: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Kafka nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.
trans-unit.target: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Kafka nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.

trans-unit.source: This template uses the Azure Linux CustomScript extension to deploy a LAMP application by creating an Ubuntu VM, doing a silent install of MySQL, Apache, and PHP, and then creating a simple PHP script.
trans-unit.target: This template uses the Azure Linux CustomScript extension to deploy a LAMP application by creating an Ubuntu VM, doing a silent install of MySQL, Apache, and PHP, and then creating a simple PHP script.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys MongoDB on an Ubuntu virtual machine by using the Linux CustomScript extension.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys MongoDB on an Ubuntu virtual machine by using the Linux CustomScript extension.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Redis cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Redis cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Redis nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.
trans-unit.target: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Redis nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.

trans-unit.source: This template creates three new Azure VMs, each with a public IP address, a load balancer, and a virtual network.
trans-unit.target: This template creates three new Azure VMs, each with a public IP address, a load balancer, and a virtual network.

trans-unit.source: It configures one VM to be an Active Directory DC for a new forest and domain, one with SQL Server domain joined, and the third with a SharePoint farm and site.
trans-unit.target: It configures one VM to be an Active Directory DC for a new forest and domain, one with SQL Server domain joined, and the third with a SharePoint farm and site.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a Spark cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a Spark cluster on Ubuntu virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Spark nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.
trans-unit.target: The template also creates one publicly accessible VM that acts as a "jumpbox" so you can SSH into the Spark nodes for diagnostics or troubleshooting purposes.

trans-unit.source: This template installs OpenJDK and Tomcat on an Ubuntu VM.
trans-unit.target: This template installs OpenJDK and Tomcat on an Ubuntu VM.

trans-unit.source: This template deploys a complete LAMP stack to a single Ubuntu VM and then installs and initializes WordPress.
trans-unit.target: This template deploys a complete LAMP stack to a single Ubuntu VM and then installs and initializes WordPress.

trans-unit.source: This template creates a three-node ZooKeeper cluster on Ubuntu VMs.
trans-unit.target: This template creates a three-node ZooKeeper cluster on Ubuntu VMs.

trans-unit.source: Discover all the templates at your disposal on [GitHub](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates).
trans-unit.target: Discover all the templates at your disposal on [GitHub](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates).
